additional.name: Seasonal Check
additional.description: Try out the new, innovative Ford Econo Check and see for yourself how easy it can be to reduce your Ford's fuel consumption. And also reduce your carbon footprint.

additional.name: Full Air Conditioning Service
additional.description: The air conditioning system in your Ford must be serviced at regular intervals. Your Ford Dealer offers you a comprehensive air conditioning check at a price that won?t hurt your wallet.

additional.name: Front Wiper Blade Change
additional.description: Keep your wiper blades in good condition to be sure to keep a clear view: you might not use your wiper blades every single day, but day in, day out they are exposed to the weather, sunlight and chemical elements in the air.

additional.name: Ford Mobile Servicing
additional.description: To drive safely, you need the right tyres in good condition, as they affect the steering, braking and acceleration of your vehicle. Worn tyres make it less predictable to drive and more likely to skid.

additional.name: Courtesy Car
additional.description: Stay mobile while your Ford is in the best hands with your Ford Dealer. Along with booking a service, make a reservation for a courtesy car while yours is being serviced.

additional.name: Car Wash
additional.description: We'll thoroughly wash your vehicle, removing all surface dirt with foams which are tough on dirt but gentle on paintwork and don't harm the environment.

additional.name: Interim Check (Commercials only)
additional.description: Your dealer can perform additional checks and changes at the same time as your scheduled service, to refresh and enhance your driving experience.
